name: @ne1410s/codl
description: Indulge your apps with codl: a component model library

scripts.publish-local: npm run is-pretty && npm run test && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.publish-patch: npm run is-pretty && npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-minor: npm run is-pretty && npm run test && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-major: npm run is-pretty && npm run test && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: ne1410s <pgj646@gmail.com> (http://ne1410s.co.uk)
